thread.title: New Mom Foxy Brown Just Beat Nicki Minaj To The Punch! Check Out Her Combative Response To Remy Ma's Diss Track!
thread.title_full: New Mom Foxy Brown Just Beat Nicki Minaj To The Punch! Check Out Her Combative Response To Remy Ma's Diss Track!

author: Perez Hilton
title: New Mom Foxy Brown Just Beat Nicki Minaj To The Punch! Check Out Her Combative Response To Remy Ma's Diss Track!
text:
3/03/2017 8:20 PM ET | Filed under: Music Minute • Celebrity Feuds • Nicki Minaj 
As the world waits for Nicki Minaj to respond to the VICIOUS dragging she got at the hands of Remy Ma in the new diss track ShETHER , someone else is jumping in: 
Miss Foxy Brown ! 
What does Foxy have to do with this? Well, one of the lines in ShETHER is: 
"Talking shit about me to a deaf bitch/And usually I have sympathy for the impaired, But not when you hard of hearin' from untreated gonorrhea" 
DAMN! That line apparently refers to the hearing trouble the Get Me Home rapper suffered in the mid 2000s. Yeah, Foxy was supposedly the friend with whom Nicki was talking shit. 
What does the new mom — who JUST gave birth to a baby girl btw — have to say in response? Let's just say she starts with, "Brooklyn, Imma kill this bitch," and it only gets more hardcore from there. 
Listen to a full minute of brutal backhand (below)!
